definition: To come to mind suddenly or to recall something that was forgotten. It is often used to describe the act of remembering or having a sudden realization.

examples.german: Es fällt mir schwer, mich zu konzentrieren.
examples.english: I find it hard to concentrate.

examples.german: Ihm fällt immer etwas Lustiges ein.
examples.english: He always comes up with something funny.

examples.german: Es ist mir eingefallen, dass ich noch einkaufen muss.
examples.english: I remembered that I still have to go shopping.
